contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|voice}} The '''[[voice]]''' consists of sound made by a human being using the vocal folds for talking, singing, laughing, crying, screaming, etc. '''Voice''' may also refer to: * [[Writer's voice]] * [[Voice acting]] * [[Voice vote]] {{tocright}} ==Film== * [[Voice (film)|''Voice'' (film)]], a 2005 South Korean film * [[The Voice (film)|''The Voice'' (film)]], a 2010 Turkish horror film directed by Ümit Ünal ==Music== * [[Vocal music]] ** The human voice in [[singing]] * Voice [[register (music)]] ** [[Vocal range]], referring to soprano, alto, tenor, bass in choral and pop music ** [[Voice type]], referring to operatic and classical soloists * [[Voice (polyphony)]], a melodic strand in a polyphonic texture * A monophonic signal in [[sound synthesis]] * [[Voice (Barratt Band album)|''Voice'' (Barratt Band album)]] * [[Voice (Alison Moyet album)|''Voice'' (Alison Moyet album)]] * [[Voice (Mika Nakashima album)|''Voice'' (Mika Nakashima album)]], 2008 * [[Voice (Perfume song)|"Voice" (Perfume song)]], 2010 * "Voice", a song by Korean singer [[Baek Ji-young]] * "Voice", a song by VNV Nation from ''[[Praise the Fallen]]'' * "Voice", theme song from the series ''[[Macross Plus]]'' * [[Voice (quartet)]], a vocal quartet founded by [[Julie Tippetts]], Maggie Nicols, Phil Minton, and Brian Eley * [[Voice (Hiromi album)|''Voice'' (Hiromi album)]], 2011 * [[Voice (Emi Hinouchi album)|''Voice'' (Emi Hinouchi album)]] * [[Voice (Neal Schon album)|''Voice'' (Neal Schon album)]], 2001 * [[Voice (jazz)]], a jazz quintet from South Africa * [[Voice (Porno Graffitti song)|"Voice" (Porno Graffitti song)]], 2001 ==Linguistics== * [[Voice (phonetics)]] * [[Grammatical voice]] * [[Austronesian alignment]] ==Other== * [[Voice (trade union)]], a United Kingdom education trade union * [[Voice (comics)]], a Marvel Comics supervillain * [[Internet censorship in Iran|Victims of Iranian Censorship (VOICE)]] Act * [[Vaginal and Oral Interventions to Control the Epidemic]] (VOICE), a clinical trial ==See also== * [[VOIS]], a US based startup company traded on the OTC:BB * [[The Voice (disambiguation)]] * [[Voices (disambiguation)]] * [[Voicing (disambiguation)]] {{disambiguation}}
